name: Hyper
overview: An action game by Marcus Hinzmann, published in GO64! 2003/01. This is an action game where you take your pulsating light ship and navigate the treacherous caverns either against a friend\foe or against the computer. Every time you clip a rocky outcropping or stalagmite your shields are worn down just a bit, if you can keep clear it will regenerate but big hits will cost you. The craft more skillfully piloted will live and therefore win!
